accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the agent(s), evaluated against the expected outcome.

completeness.description: The extent to which the agent(s) fulfilled all requirements of the task, including identifying all necessary steps and providing a complete solution.

efficiency.description: How effectively the agent(s) utilized resources and time to arrive at the solution.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the reasoning process of the agent(s) that led to the final answer.

originality.description: The uniqueness of the solution and the ability to provide an answer not easily found in existing databases or the Internet.

understandability.description: How well a human can understand the solution and the steps that were taken by the agent(s) to reach it.
